p: Packaging can also be made smart by inducing a nano-sensor. Nano-sensors are tiny sensors attached either to food or food packaging. They can detect pathogenic bacteria, viruses and chemical contaminants in the food system [ 68]. They are highly efficient as one sensor can identify a wide range of pathogens. Nano-sensor research is focused on the rapid detection of contaminants in and around food and the tracking of food by the incorporation of a nano-sensor in the food packaging material.
